name: GEWU
goal: GEWU is the Group of Educational and Scientific Publishers: a member organisation that defends the interests of these specific group of professional publishers.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, External Relations, Fraud prevention, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: As a representatieve, GEWU wants to debate with and advice on digital developments, learning methodes, quality criteria in scientific books, adjustments to laws and regulations, starting from a positive view and always based on strong arguments.
